title: Introduction to Neural Networks
author: Prof. Alex Johnson
description: A comprehensive guide to understanding the fundamentals of neural networks and their applications in modern machine learning.

title: Advanced Calculus Lecture Series
author: Dr. Maria Rodriguez
description: A video series covering advanced topics in calculus including multivariable calculus, differential equations, and vector analysis.

title: Effective Study Techniques for STEM Students
author: Learning Development Center
description: Learn proven methods to improve your study efficiency, memory retention, and test performance in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics subjects.

title: Python Programming for Data Science
author: Tech Learning Hub
description: A practical guide to using Python for data analysis, visualization, and machine learning with real-world examples and exercises.

title: Quantum Computing Fundamentals
author: Dr. James Chen
description: An introductory series on quantum computing principles, covering quantum bits, gates, algorithms, and potential applications.

title: History of Mathematics through the Ages
author: Historical Society of Mathematics
description: Explore the fascinating development of mathematical concepts from ancient civilizations to modern times, and the people who changed the field forever.
